pages.text: Has a chance to drop from killing an Illager Vizier.$(br)Grants the player Nourishment (30 minutes), Opportunity III (10 minutes), Dexterity III (10 minutes), Resistance II (10 minutes)$(br)After consumption, kills nearby Vexes/Vindicators/Allays and similar creatures, while restoring health equal to the sum of the killed units' maximum health. Can be consumed 8 times total.$(b)(Consumption count is recorded via additional NBT, cannot be repaired)

A huge cake decorated with cream and jam, rumored to be a delicate delicacy offered by the illager forces to their ruler.$(br)After eating it, the sweet scent that disperses can even scatter flying souls, while fragmented souls can mend the diner's wounds.$(br)Wandering souls are fragile and cannot appreciate delicacies, how sad, how unfortunate.$(br)But can your soul withstand the repeated impact of this delicacy? Probably not.$(br)After seeing this cake, you can probably understand why someone would be so angry.

If someone drags you into a duel when you're about to enjoy a delicacy, even if you have a good temper, you'll want to crush them completely.$(br)This is an irreconcilable grudge that must be avenged.
